title: Instructional Design Strategies to Improve Vocational Education Quality and Employment Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced mathematics fundamentals and understanding of vocational education systems
context.additional_context: Strengthening employment capabilities through vocational education quality analysis based on mathematical domain expertise

learning_goals: Learners can derive five vocational education quality evaluation indicators using the Delphi technique
Learners can quantify the impact of educational quality on graduates' human capital using empirical analysis methods
A mathematical model can be designed to establish the causal relationship between education, human capital, and employment quality
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
